name: mesell
description: A secure and trusted pre-order ecommerce platform built for the Nigerian and African market, featuring escrow payments, seller verification, and localized experiences.

scripts.setup: pnpm run setup-server && pnpm run setup-client
scripts.watch: pnpm run server & pnpm run client
scripts.deploy: pnpm --prefix frontend build && pnpm --prefix backend build && pnpm --prefix backend start
scripts.test: pnpm --prefix backend run test && pnpm --prefix frontend run test

author: Idoma Ngbede
